Line: Then why are you still here?
Good. Do you remember anything now?
That's fine. Here's something that might help:
When you're done talking to me, open your inventory with the button I.
Then, select the object with the arrow keys and Z, and close your inventory with I.
With the object still selected, talk to me again to show it to me.
